about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights which may trigger seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

PLAY TIME
Play time is 2 hours. The game has only one ending.

The Snare is a single-player crime and horror game. Upon waking, Atlas discovers a mysterious message on his phone revealing that his wife has been kidnapped. Following a trail of cryptic clues from a motel, he finds himself drawn into a sinister mental asylum. Within its shadowy halls, as he uncovers the reason behind Samira's abduction, he will encounter startling truths that will shatter everything he thought he knew.

The game takes you through the gloomy corridors of a mental asylum, where you must eliminate enemies while searching for missing items and pieces to solve puzzles. At the same time, you'll have to deal with supernatural beings that appear to you under the influence of hallucinations.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Solve Puzzles
Find missing items and solve puzzles to get closer to the truth.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hallucinations and Enemies
Eliminate enemies that try to block you while trying to protect reality at the same time. Never underestimate your enemies

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of blood, gore, violence and suicide that may be disturbing. Some content may not be suitable for all ages.

short_description: The Snare is a single-player crime and horror game. Atlas follows clues sent by the masked man to rescue his wife, Samira. As he attempts to uncover the reason behind Samira's abduction, he encounters startling truths, plunging into a labyrinth of deceit and danger.
